narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ageless Living Home Health LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Fort Worth, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $118.7M in Medicaid payments across 379K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $118.7M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,840 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
